body_html: I'm away from the computer now, will take a look at it tomorrow. First thing I'd look at are parameters passed to Cudnn in torch and pytorch - they must be different somehow. That said, getting cuda error is strange, Cudnn should have returned some Cudnn error status.

body: I'm away from the computer now, will take a look at it tomorrow. First thing I'd look at are parameters passed to Cudnn in torch and pytorch - they must be different somehow. That said, getting cuda error is strange, Cudnn should have returned some Cudnn error status.
